metadata.title: L&S Tech - Specialized IT Consulting
metadata.description: Custom IT solutions for companies seeking innovation, security, and performance.

hero.title: Transform your infrastructure into a competitive advantage
hero.subtitle: Custom IT solutions for companies seeking innovation, security, and performance. From planning to execution.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete solutions for your company
services.description: We offer a comprehensive portfolio of IT services, tailored to your business's specific needs.

cloud.title: Fullstack Development
cloud.description: End-to-end web and mobile applications. Modern and responsive frontend, scalable and performant backend. Robust APIs, third-party integrations and modern architectures that ensure high performance and scalability.

security.title: Platforms & Services
security.description: Building scalable SaaS platforms, marketplaces, management systems and complete digital products. Microservices architecture, public and private APIs, and integration ecosystems that generate real value.

development.title: DevOps & Automation
development.description: Complete process automation with custom workflows. Deployment management and automation, simplified continuous integration pipelines, system integration and task automation. Reduce manual work and accelerate daily operations.

data.title: Cloud & Infrastructure
data.description: Cloud-native architectures on leading cloud platforms. Strategic migration, cost optimization, auto-scaling and high availability. Serverless architectures, edge computing and hybrid solutions that grow with your business.

infrastructure.title: Applied Security
infrastructure.description: Security by design: vulnerability analysis, automated compliance and layered protection. Advanced security policy implementation, complete encryption and 24/7 incident response.

support.title: Data & Intelligence
support.description: Robust data pipelines and modern storage. Advanced Business Intelligence, operational artificial intelligence and real-time analytics. Transform data into strategic decisions that drive results.

about.title: About Us
about.heading: Partners in innovation and technology
about.description: L&S Tech was born from the passion to transform technological challenges into growth opportunities. With a multidisciplinary team of specialists, we deliver solutions that make a difference.
benefits: Team certified in the main market technologies

locations.title: Global Presence
locations.heading: Projects across 4 continents
locations.description: With international experience, we have developed high-impact technological solutions in different countries, connecting cultures and technologies.
